lines.gurmukhi: ckeI ckor miRg mIn BiRMg Aau pqMg pRIiq iek AMgI bhu rMgI duKdweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Chakaee Chakor Mrig Meen Bhring Au Patanga , Preeti Ik Angee Bahu Rangee Doukhadaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The love of a Ruddy Sheldrake with Sun, Allictoris gracea with Moon, deer with melody of Ghandey Herhey, fish with water, a black bee with lotus flower and of a moth with light is one-sided. Such one-sided love is often painful in many ways.

lines.gurmukhi: eyk eyk tyk sY trq n mrq sbY Awid AMiq kI cwl clI AweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ayk Ayk Tayk Sai Tarat N Marat Sabai , Aadi Anti Kee Chaal Chalee Aaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All these lovers do not abstain from their faith of one-sided love and in the process give away their lives. This tradition of worldly love is going on since the beginning of ages.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK sMgiq imlwp ko pRqwpu AYso log prlog suKdwiek shweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Sangati Milaap Ko Prataapu Aiso , Log Paralog Soukhadaaik Sahaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: But the importance of two-sided love of a Sikh of the Guru and his True Guru is such that can prove helpful and peaceful in this world and the world beyond.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmiq suin durmiq n imtq jw kI Aih imil cMdn ijau ibKu n imtweI hY ]316]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmati Souni Duramati N Mitat Jaa Kee , Ahi Mili Chandan Jiu Bikhu N Mitaaee Hai ?316?

Shabad OS B.translation: With such comforting love of the Guru available close at hand, if one does not listen to the teachings of the Guru and who does not dispel one's base wisdom, then such a person is no better than a snake who does not shed his venom even after embracing San
